name: The Casey Neistat Game
description:
Hey,

I'm a seventeen-years-old Polish boy. I am happy to present you my three-months effort: The Casey Neistat Game.
I originally started developing this game as a submission for a computer science assignment. Later I came up with an idea of making a fanmade Casey Neistat version of the game as I enjoy watching his vlogs. And here it is :) 

Music by: 
Sim Gretina https://soundcloud.com/simgretina
Dyalla Swain http://soundcloud.com/dyallas
Ross Bugden http://rossbugden.com/

Instructions: Move with arrows, shoot with space. While playing click ESC to pause or M to mute. While in main menu click Alt+F1 for help.

I tried my best to make this game work on OS X but I failed. Sorry!
